entry.title: The Sport Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description
The ultimate in gym duffles! With handles to easily grab, a padded crossbody and shoulder strap for the long haul, stow-away padded backpack straps and a trolley sleeve to slip over your luggage handle for when you're really on-the-go - this bag was made to move with you, in literally every way! Designed to fit perfectly in a gym locker but so good looking you'll never want to hide it away!

 
Specifications

Dims: 10"H x 17"W x 8.5"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
Compact duffle shape - sized perfectly to fit into a gym locker
4 ways to carry
hand-held straps with wrap
Removable & adjustable padded shoulder strap for shoulder of crossbody carry
EXTERIOR
Hidden padded backpack straps on bottom
Branded padded pull handle to easily grab and go or hang from a locker hook
Side elasticized slip pocket
Front cargo zip pocket
Trolley sleeve with zipper - so you can use as slip pocket when not traveling
Exterior quick-access zip pocket for fun at top seam
INTERIOR
2 large elasticized slip pocket
1 large zip pocket
2 mesh zip pockets
Included is a ‘DIRT BAG’ for dirty clothing, shoes, etc.

How you can move with this product
Perfect gym bag - sized to fit into gym lockers
On-the-go - multi ways to carry

entry.title: The Travel Yoga Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description
Yoga, stretching, ab work or just a little Savasana - however you decide you want to move today this lightweight mat will get you through it. Designed to roll up and be toted around with it's own included strap or tucked into the straps of your favorite MOVES style. Namaste!
Specifications

Dims: 26"H x 70"W x 4mm
Materials: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE); Poly webbing strap.
Care: Spray with warm water & a few drops of dish soap or a 3:1 water to vinegar solution. Wipe clean with a damp towel or sponge. Do not leave out in the sun. Do not fold but roll for storage.

 
Details
Made of biodegradable TPE synthetic rubber
Roll up and secure with included strap for easy carry and storage
Engraved BEIS Logo
Light weight

How you can move with this product
Yoga, pilates, any work out that you need a little extra padding! Naps :)

entry.title: The Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Getting clean never felt so ... clean. This shower caddy was designed to drain and dry so you can get on with your day after that intense (or not so) workout. The mesh material is quick drying and will ensure no pools of water collect. Just enough room for all your shower needs and a few extra necessities.
Specifications

Dims: 9.5"H x 4.5"W x 5"D
Materials: PVC
Care: Clean with warm water and soap, air dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The you gym friendly shower caddy
Mesh material for easy draining and drying
Easy to hang over a shower head, on a hook or clipped over a towel bar
Front flap folds down to show interior
Mesh panel keeps products upright for easy storage and display
Elastic loops for a tooth brush and/or razor
Exterior side zip pocket

How you can move with this product
Cosmetics & toiletries
Shower caddy for gym and beyond
Travel

entry.title: The Sport Wristlet Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description
At first glance this little beauty might look like a cute wristlet, but she is SO much more. Each piece was designed so that you could carry them as a set or individually. The d-ring on each pouch can also be attached to the inside of any BÉIS bag, using our signature key fob (you can find this on interior seam of every BÉIS bag). Even better, the small snap card case comes with a scruchie, take it for a spin on it's own and never have a reason you can't pull your hair back!

 
Specifications

Dims: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: 2.625"H x 3.875"W
ROUND ZIP POUCH: 3.5"W X 3.5"H
RECTANGLE ZIP POUCH: 4.25"H X 7.5"W
Materials: CREDIT CARD HOLDER: Exterior - PU, Interior - Recycled Poly
ROUND AND RECTANGLE POUCHES: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
STRAP: Macrame Nylon Paracord
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The perfect set of accessories to keep all your gym (and beyond) needs organized
3 different pouches:
1 round zip pouch with an interior elasticized slip pocket - perfect for airpods, earbuds, hair accessories, jewelry
1 long zip pouch - perfect for cash, a few makeup items
1 snap envelope pouch perfect for cards - includes a removable scrunchie that can be used to slip the pouch on your wrist or throwing your hair in a pony
Multiple ways to carry
Carry all three together or individually with the provided braided paracord wristlet strap
D-rings on each style so you can easily clip into any BEIS bag’s included key leash
The envelope pouch can slip onto wrist alone using removable scrunchie
How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
The perfect necessities only gym companion

entry.title: The Sport Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 54.00

Description
If you know us, you know we can never create a bag that can only do one thing! This tote, backpack, yoga mat carrying, tennis racket fitting bag is absolutely no exception. Designed to be your go-to bag when your moving around, light trips to the gyms or a trip to your local yoga studio The Sport Tote will be your go to bag when you're on-the-move!

 
Specifications

Dims: 16"H x 12"W x 5.5"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
Simple - multi-wear and multi-use tote
2 ways to carry
As tote with webbing straps
As a backpack with adjustable backpack straps
Backpack straps when tightened also make a great place to thread a yoga mat, towel or jacket/extra layer
EXTERIOR
2 large side elasticized slip pockets
Drawstring & cord lock closure
INTERIOR
Large zip pocket
Key-leash to easily locate keys or clip to any pouch with a d-ring
2 slip pockets

How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
Yoga, pilates, dance class

entry.title: Stroller Straps
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 18.00

Description
Pretty simple - turn any bag - with d-rings that you would normally strap a removable strap to - and turn it into a diaper bag. All you need is our Tote Insert and these Stroller Straps and you've pretty much just made your own innovative mom (or dad) on the go bag!
Specifications
Dims: 10" Loop
Materials: Poly Webbing with silicone grip
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.25lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- logo straps with snap hooks to wrap around stroller handles and connect any diaper bag with d-rings
- silicone grip on poly webbing prevents slippage
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Pumping Backpack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 88.00

Description
Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine! We've added an insulated compartment in this backpack to easily and safely get that liquid gold from point A to point B.
Specifications
Dims: 14" W x 16" H x 7" D
Materials: Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly, Hardware: Zinc Alloy
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.5lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- compartment specifically for your pump ( fit's most pumps)- with a zipper opening
to feed tubes through on the exterior and an opening to feed the power cord through
- padded shoulder straps
- top handles - easy to grab and go
- 4 exterior slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
INTERIOR
- interior zip pocket
- padded laptop sleeve
- 2 interior slip pockets
- comes with water proof zip pouch
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Puffer Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 78.00

Description
Gear up for the winter season with The Puffy Tote. This perfect sized edition to our tote collection comes with all the winter fun necessities, including a water resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear (or bathing suit if you’re not a snow bunny), a padded laptop sleeve and a hidden cell phone pocket - so documenting your adventures is never a task of hide & seek.

 
Shay's Inspo

“To me, this bag exemplifies the fabrication and highlights everything I love about this style. It’s perfectly shaped, sized and has features galore on the inside, too, to make it just as functional and is it fashionable.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
WATER RESISTANT BOTTOM COMPARTMENT
For your hat & gloves, shoes or bathing suit!
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry
HIDDEN EXTERNAL POCKET
Because: phone & keys.
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 15” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

entry.title: The Changing Organizer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 38.00

Description

When you are always on-the-go - even within your own home - a portable changing pad is a must have! Roomy enough to go from newborn to toddler, padded to provide a protective and comfortable landing space for your little one and folds up to a compact accessory that can go from nursery, to living room, to car, to changing room, anywhere, because we know THAT is not on a schedule!
Specifications

Dims: 21" W x 35" L x 0.5" H
Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Poly Mesh, Lining: 100% Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- larger, portable changing pad
- folds up into easy to grab and go
- wristlet strap with snap for easy carry or to loop around a bag or stroller handle
INTERIOR
- mesh pocket for diapers
- zip pocket for wipes
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like this original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 14.25" W x 11"H x 6"D Materials: Body - Faux Croc PU Lining - Polyester

Laptop Sleeve: 12.5"W x 9"H

Strap - Polyester Care: Spot Clean

Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure

1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket

Removable interior zip pouch

entry.title: The Messenger in Black Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description

Did you know some people pack light?! If you are a fan of this brand you know we love a big bag, but some people are just so good they know how to get by with just the right amount of items, only the essentials - that's why and how this black messenger bag was created. A padded compartment for a laptop, a zip pocket with a couple of organizational slip pockets, pen slips, two ways to carry, and a trolley passthrough. This faux leather messenger bag is sleek and effortless simplicity at its best.
Specifications

Dims: 13.5 x 1.5" x 9.5"
Body - Faux Croc PU & Faux Leather/PU, Lining - Polyester & Mircofiber, Strap - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- the perfect size laptop & work bag for just the essentials
- main body is neoprene padded compartment for holding up to a 13" laptop or tablet
- front compartment has two slip pockets and 2 pen pockets & key fob
- top handle for carrying in hand or at the crook of your arm
- removable adjustable shoulder strap to carry on your shoulder or crossbody
- custom hardware: d-rings & bar-turnlock closure
- large back, exterior slip pocket
- trolley sleeve
PERFECT FOR
Everyday Work
Days Weekends
Carry-On

entry.summary:

Description
We love a design that gives you EVERYTHING but sometimes simplicity is the key to great design, especially when a classic is so good - why mess with it?! The BEIS Rucksack is a modern rendition of classic utilitarian style - an all-purpose backpack - with all the right purposes. Multiple pockets, inside & out - a padded sleeve for your laptop and of course a trolley sleeve to make this style as on-the-go as you are..

entry.title: The On The Go Essential Case in Sakura Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

Stop the pre-flight dig with our two-faced travel companion. Designed to keep your beauty essentials organized from take-off to touch-down with an easy-to-carry handle and a mini-mirror. Tackle your travel beauty routine effortlessly.
Specifications
Dims: 7.5"W X 3.5"H x 5.25"D
Materials:
Body: PU, PVC
Lining: Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.56lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- faux leather fabrication
- gold foil stamped 'let's go" & "we're here" label for compartments
- double sided cosmetic case to separate your take-off and touch-down needs (and beyond)
- single U-zip wide opening/closure for easy access to beauty essentials
- clear windows to help you see what's inside
INTERIOR
- slip pocket with mini removable mirror
PERFECT FOR:
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care (face cream, sprays)
-Toiletries
-Eye Mask
-Face Mask
-Lip Gloss
-Hot Mess Wipes
-Hand Sanitizer
-toothpaste & toothbrush

entry.title: The Lingerie Packing Cube Set in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

No one wants to be that person whose luggage comes off the carousel with that lone pair of underwear peaking out. This set of packing cubes was designed to prevent that exact type of embarrassment well that and to keep your delicates safely tucked away and easily accessible upon arrival. This 5 piece set was designed to keep your bra cups intact, your dirty and clean underwear separated and the washing of these items when you arrive back home less of a chore.
Shay's Inspo

"Whether you like grannies or something a little lighter in coverage, this set will not only keep you organized while on the go, it also keeps the clean pieces away from the dirty. Light on the unmentionables? These cubes easily double in purpose for other travel essentials." - Shay
Details

5-PIECE SET
Keep your delicates organized
WASH BAG
Easy to unpack & launder 
TO WASH, TO WEAR
Keep dirty & clean items in their place
UNMENTIONABLES
Keep those (wink-wink) items tucked away!
DIMENSIONS
12 x 4 x 9.5
